sentences.en: A dusky blush rose to her cheek.
sentences.cn: 一抹淡淡的羞涩泛上她的面颊.

sentences.en: A dusky tumult would flap its wings from one house to another.
sentences.cn: 一阵破晓时的喧闹将从一家飞到另一家.

sentences.en: Before long, here comes the wreck , dim and dusky, sliding along down!
sentences.cn: 过了不大一会儿工夫, 那只破船就过来了, 黑忽忽的一片, 一直向下游漂荡.

sentences.en: Dusky Sound to follow and discover the different groups of dolphins.
sentences.cn: 跟踪和探索不同种群的海豚.

sentences.en: From her mother she inherited warmth of nature and dusky, semi - tropic beauty.
sentences.cn: 她从母亲那儿秉承了热情的性格和亚热带的那种皮肤微黑的美.

sentences.en: Heavy gold earrings gleamed against her dusky cheeks.
sentences.cn: 沉甸甸的金耳环在她黝黑的面颊的衬托下熠熠发光。

sentences.en: Her dusky mouth was parted slightly to show tiny white teeth.
sentences.cn: 她那暗色的嘴微微启开,露出洁白的小牙齿.

sentences.en: She had the kind of water - gipsy face , dusky but rosy.
sentences.cn: 她长着水上吉普赛人的脸孔, 黑里透红.

sentences.en: The bracken was turning to the dusky gold of a fine autumn.
sentences.cn: 欧洲蕨在晴朗的秋天正变为暗金色.

sentences.en: the dusky light inside the cave
The dusky night rides down the sky and ushers in the morn.
sentences.cn: 微黑的夜晚飞过天空,宣告黎明正在到来.

sentences.en: The hand may become painful, cold, pale, dusky, or swollen.
sentences.cn: 手可能会变得疼痛 、 冷 、 苍白 、 灰暗或肿胀.

sentences.en: The mountains were just visible , dusky and black.
The room was filled with dusky shadows.
sentences.cn: 房间里到处都是朦胧的影子。

sentences.en: The tabloids reported that he had been seen with a dusky young woman.
sentences.cn: 小报上说有人看见他与一位肤色黝黑的年轻女子在一起.

sentences.en: Through the window he saw the great honey - coloured moon hanging in the dusky air.
sentences.cn: 穿过窗户他看见蜜色的大月亮挂在朦胧的天空.

trans.tran_en: dark or not very bright in colour
